ygData.subject: Re: Verant's stupidity rears it's ugly head..... POTTERY
ygData.msgSnippet: Lets not turn this into a flame mailer. I think we all have better things to do then read about someone complaining about someone else.  On another note, has
ygData.messageBody:
Lets not turn this into a flame mailer. I think we all have better things to do
then read about someone complaining about someone else. On another note, has
anyone else noticed that Giants seem to be carrying alot more plat these days.
Before the patch I was getting an average 2ish plat per giant (3 person party)
and now its up to around 11ish per giant. Not a bad increase I must say. Made
around 150 plat in one night. Makes sense to me since they are around lvl 35 and
hit to damn hard. Also has anyone get one of those no weight boxes of the
spectres yet??
